content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It sounds like you and Emily have a great plan in place for a lovely brunch and hike. The Daily Grind and Riverview Trail are both excellent choices, and I'm sure you'll have a fantastic time catching up and enjoying the beautiful scenery.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you have a wonderful time on your outing and create some amazing memories with Emily!

Happy brunching and hiking!
